title: Purse, late 17th–early 18th century
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: (a) Envelope-shaped purse in blue-green silk brocaded in silver and gold with rose silk. Bird under canopy with confronted rampant lions. (b) Blue silk brocaded in silver. Basket of flowers, center, with symmetrical floral border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, late 17th–early 18th century.
late 17th–early 18th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: woven. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-56-24-a,b.
